content: portland by adrienne krey hoodie cowl about this pattern this hoodie cowl is the ulltimate in cozy inspired by the comfort and casualness of a sweatshirt hoodie this easy to knit cowl has a drawstring hood that cinches closed to keep out the cold knit with two colors or one the unisex styling means it s great for the whole family check out the last page for some inspiration on various ways to wear your hoodie cowl guaranteed to be your new best friend beginner friendly the skills you ll need to know or be willing to learn in this pattern are how to knit and purl how to increase and decrease how to pick up stitches how to knit i-cord optional how to do a three needle bind off beginner option or how to graft stitches advanced option sizing yarn needles 2 skeins bulky weight size 10 us 24 or 36 circular gauge 3 5 stitches per yarn approx 170 yards adjust for gauge if needed inch in stockinette stitch each + 1 spare straight needle between size one size fits most size 9-11 + 2 size 10 double yarn shown madelintosh tosh chunky in grove pointed needles and charcoal ©2012 neeka knits adrienne krey ● www neekaknits com ● for personal use only pattern overview bind off like normal but knit the stitches from both needles together as you bind off see picture below first you ll knit the cowl next you ll knit the hood then you join them together easy as pie the cowl is knit flat and then seamed why you ask i find this prevents the cowl from stretching out and drooping over time if you d rather knit the cowl in the round go ahead and cast on approx 70 stitches instead and then knit till it s a width you like taking the rolling of the edges into account otherwise you can follow the instructions for seaming depending on whether you d rather cast on like normal and do a three needle bind off at the end choice #2 grafting or do a provisional cast on and graft the stitches cast on 49 stitches using a provisional cast on closed at the end the first option is faster and easier the second option creates a seamless look once knit in stockinette stitch for 20 inches unstretched you ve made your choice let s get knitting finish with a purl side row and then remove the oh and to prevent any confusion down the line it s a good idea stitches from the provisional cast on and graft to read through the entire pattern before you start that way together the two sets of live stitches in stockinette you know what you re getting yourself into hood section pattern instructions co 64 stitches cowl section knit 10 row in stockinette starting with a knit row to create pouch for
